import axios from'axios';export var LOADING='LOADING';export var SUCCESS='SUCCESS';export var BTN='BTN';export var NAVIGATION='NAVIGATION';export var MODE='MODE';export var PROJ_SWITCH='PROJ_SWITCH';export var SHOW='SHOW';export var ERR='ERR';//=============================================================================/
export var getMyWork=function getMyWork(){return function(dispatch){//get my work that ill be displaying on my page
dispatch({type:LOADING});axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_mywork).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:SUCCESS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:ERR,payload:err});});};};//=============================================================================/
//no dispatch throwing needed , but can be store here for good use of redux aysnc control
export var tog_description=function tog_description(id){return function(dispatch){var target=document.querySelector("#".concat(id));//--------------------------------------------
/off/i.test(target.getAttribute('class'))?target.setAttribute('class','fas fa-toggle-on'):target.setAttribute('class','fas fa-toggle-off');};};//=============================================================================/
export var changeBtnLabel=function changeBtnLabel(label){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:BTN,payload:label});};};//=============================================================================/
export var navBar=function navBar(whereTo){return function(dispatch){switch(whereTo){case'Home':window.sessionStorage.setItem('nav',whereTo);setTimeout(function(){var view='#intro';document.querySelector(view).scrollIntoView();},500);return dispatch({type:NAVIGATION,payload:whereTo});case'Projects':window.sessionStorage.setItem('nav',whereTo);setTimeout(function(){var view='#intro-proj';document.querySelector(view).scrollIntoView();},500);return dispatch({type:NAVIGATION,payload:whereTo});default:return false;}};};//=============================================================================/
export var showOrNot=function showOrNot(choice){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:SHOW,payload:!choice});};};//=============================================================================/
export var DarkMode=function DarkMode(mode){return function(dispatch){if(mode){window.sessionStorage.setItem('toggleDarkMode',mode);return dispatch({type:MODE,payload:mode});}else{window.sessionStorage.setItem('toggleDarkMode',mode);return dispatch({type:MODE,payload:mode});}};};export var $witch=function $witch(type,reset){return function(dispatch){var regi=new RegExp(type,'gi');if(regi.test('all')){return dispatch({type:PROJ_SWITCH,payload:reset});}else{var val=reset.filter(function(x){return x.description.toLowerCase().includes(type.toLowerCase());});return dispatch({type:PROJ_SWITCH,payload:val});}};};window.onload=function(){document.addEventListener("contextmenu",function(e){e.preventDefault();},false);document.addEventListener("keydown",function(e){if(e.ctrlKey&&e.shiftKey&&e.keyCode===73){disabledEvent(e);}if(e.ctrlKey&&e.shiftKey&&e.keyCode===74){disabledEvent(e);}if(e.keyCode===83&&(navigator.platform.match("Mac")?e.metaKey:e.ctrlKey)){disabledEvent(e);}if(e.ctrlKey&&e.keyCode===85){disabledEvent(e);}if(e.keyCode===123){disabledEvent(e);}},false);var disabledEvent=function disabledEvent(e){if(e.stopPropagation){e.stopPropagation();}else if(window.event){window.event.cancelBubble=true;}e.preventDefault();return false;};};
